title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about our boat rental service

location.question: Where are the boats located?
location.answer: The boats are located in the city center of Malinska, near the Maritime Heritage Interpretation Center DUBoak (Obala 22, 51511, Malinska, Croatia).

gasStation.question: Is there a gas station for boats near Malinska?
gasStation.answer: No, there are no gas stations for boats in Malinska. The closest one is in the City of Krk, approximately 13 miles (24 km) away. However, no need to worry – we'll refill the tank for you!

longerRental.question: Can I rent a boat for a longer period?
longerRental.answer: Yes, you can! For example, you can rent a boat for 7 days and return it daily. We will refill your gas tank every day or whenever needed.

fuel.question: Is fuel included in the rental price?
fuel.answer: No, fuel is not included in the rental price. You will pay for the fuel separately when you return the boat to the harbor.

skipper.question: Is a skipper included in the rental price?
skipper.answer: No, the skipper is not included in the price. However, if needed, you can hire one separately for an additional cost of €120 per day.

equipment.question: Do you offer additional equipment for rent?

answer.intro: Yes! We offer additional equipment such as:
answer.contact: If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us!
